title: Is it really worth it to do an MSc from Pondicherry University? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on which subject you are enrolling like M.Sc in Chemistry is one of the top levels you can look after. Otherwise French, English, Biochem etc. are also popular there. I did M.Sc in Computer Science there. I’d like to say don’t choose Pondicherry University for doing M.Sc in Computer Science there unless you’d like to spend time yourself in your study. Don’t expect much there in the Computer Science department regarding classroom studies. So many classes skipped in our time. But for self-study, it’s best. No one will care about your coursework so that you can do your own work peacefully.

Depends. On why you want to pursue M.Sc. and which course ! If you are doing M.Sc. in Marine Biology from here then it is highly recommended and a lot more than 'just worth it'.
